subject: fix: resolve UI/UX bugs and improve accessibility
body:
- Fix filter badge always visible (truthy check on object instead of
  checking values.length)
- Fix hasActiveFilters() always returning true (same bug in export.js)
- Fix toast destroying its own static DOM element on first call
- Remove duplicate updateFilterBadge() from ui.js (canonical in filters.js)
- Remove artificial 150ms skeleton delay in detail pane (data in memory)
- Add drag-and-drop file upload drop zone (replaces bare input)
- Show active filter count in badge (number instead of dot)
- Highlight active quick-select date preset button
- Add keyboard support to collapsible headers (tabindex, role, keydown)
- Add aria-labels to all icon-only header buttons
- Add 10 remaining UI/UX items to TODO.md backlog
